# Describe

## Load dat_clean from data folder

```{r}
dat_clean1 <- read_tsv(
  file = "~/group_18_project/data/02_dat_clean1.tsv",
  show_col_types = FALSE)

dat_clean2 <- read_tsv(
  file = "~/group_18_project/data/02_dat_clean2.tsv",
  show_col_types = FALSE)
```

## The group of patients used for the study

```{r}

dat_clean2 <- as_tibble(dat_clean2)
table_dat_clean2 <- dat_clean2 |> 
  filter(prostate_cancer == "yes" | bladder_cancer == "yes") |>
  table1(x = formula(~ prostate_cancer + bladder_cancer + treatment | hc_incidence),
         data = _) 

```
